name: NewsinSlowGerman
0:
”Alexa, open slow german”
”Alexa, ask slow german to play the latest episode”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: slow german
Developer Terms of Use
des:
A weekly German podcast for language learners. Improve your German comprehension quickly and stay informed!

To navigate, always remember to say: "Alexa, ask Slow German to..."

"Alexa, ask Slow German to..."
 ...rewind
 ...skip
 ...play the latest episode
 ...play episode [number]
 ...skip to [segment]*
 ...skip [number] episodes backwards
 ...skip [number] episodes forward

* available segments (for subscribers): News 1, News 2, News 3, News 4, News 5, News 6
* available segments (for non-subscribers): News 1, News 4

For more information, visit www.NewsInSlowGerman.com/alexa 
If you have questions, email us at service@NewsInSlowGerman.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
